body.name: FAIORD Cervical Pillow for Neck Pain Relief, Ergonomic Contour Memory Foam Pillows for Sleeping with Washable Pillowcase, Orthopedic Neck Support Pillow for Side Back Stomach Sleeper
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 31 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Relieve Neck & Shoulder Pain】The main reason of neck and shoulder pain is lack of support and spinal misalignment. This butterfly cervical pillow combines the benefits of traditional bed pillows & contour pillows, the ergonomic pillow designed to provide exceptional support to your head, neck and shoulders. Naturally aligns with your curved spine, ensuring proper support and spinal alignment throughout the night. Maintaining good blood flow, relieve pressure and remove muscles tension.

【Sleep Comfortable with Any Position】The unique shape contour pillow can adapt to a whole range of different sleeping styles. As a side sleeper pillow, the same slope leaves room for your shoulders and keeps your spine straight. The memory foam pillow has a thoughtful armrest area that reduces your arm numbness and provides pain-free sleep. As a stomach sleeper pillow, the raised shape makes it easier to breath and keep your arms around you.

【5S Slow Rebound Premium Memory Foam Pillow】FAIORD orthopedic pillow designed with a unique natural molded foam which is made of high quality resilient memory foam and is certified by US CertiPUR & Oeko Tex. When you lie on your back or side, the non-temperature memory foam provides the most even and true support for your neck from spring to winter, and the neck pain pillow will not become flat, lose its shape or density after long-term use.

【Breathable Cooling Pillowcase】This memory foam pillows comes with an ice silk pillowcase, which consists of soft and comfortable ice silk fabric and mesh sides that are removable and machine washable. 98% open-cell memory foam and upgraded 3D mesh pillowcase allow for ventilation and air circulation throughout the neck support pillow, reducing heat trapping and providing you with a cooler resting surface. Let your skin breathe and have a dry night!

【Travel and Gift Idea】Compact and lightweight, perfect for travel and home use. This memory foam neck pillow can lead to improve quality of life. Whether you're looking for a gift for a friend, family member, or colleague, this pillow is suitable for people of all ages. This gift idea is the perfect blend of creativity and functionality, making it a great present for any occasion.

⚡【Warm Tips】Memory foam may have a slight polyurethane smell BUT NO HARMFUL CHEMICALS. Due to high temperatures and sealed transportation, this smell may become more noticeable, which is a normal phenomenon. After receiving the pillow, please place it in a cool and ventilated place for 3-5 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have struggled with neck pain for years and this pillow has changed how I sleep. My neck pain is nearly gone. It is supportive yet soft. It is absolutely worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this pillow!
reviews.reviewText: Something about this pillow makes me fall asleep in about five minutes! It keeps me on my back and stays cool throughout the night! I wake up with no neck or back pain and love the functional design! I bought my first one in September and bought a second in December as a gift for my boyfriend because I loved it so much- must buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fixed my neck pain.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this pillow for a three month now. At first, I had to get use to the way it was curved but now that I have, I have no neck pain. It’s comfortable on the neck and shoulders. I like the grooves for your arms, as I am someone who sleeps with my arms above head at times, but I also sleep on my side. The pillow does come with a cover, but it would be nice to fine pillowcases for this. You can fit put a regular pillowcase on it, it just looks funny. Overall I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally neck pain relief!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about purchasing memory foam (I find it heats-up too much) and an unusual shape as we're all built differently, but after spending way too much money trying to find the best pillow, I'm thrilled to have this one! It's evident a lot of thought went into designing a pillow that will accommodate most people. I'm a back and side sleeper and since purchasing this pillow, I've experienced deep sleep and pain-free mornings - finally! I've slept using both heights and find both comfortable with no neck strain or my head feeling confined or tightly cradled. My favorite pillows have usually been latex because of the floating-like feeling that alleviates pressure, but the ergonomic contour of this pillow elevates comfort to a higher level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than regular pillows
reviews.reviewText: I love that there is a place for my arms as well. The support seems to even out my neck and head. My neck pain is less and it is very comfortable to sleep on. My head still gets hot at night but not as hot as with a regular pillow. This one you cannot turn over when it gets hot, only one sided.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable for back or side sleepers.. my neck feels much better since I started using this pillow. Pillow is well built and should last a long time .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Cervical and Facial Support
reviews.reviewText: My neck/shoulder and jaw pains are gone!When I sleep on my side, I use my hands to support my chin. Problem is, I unconsciously push against my chin & cheeks and end up hurting myself (the effect is like punching the side of my face).With this pillow's ergonomic shape and firmness, I don't have to use my hands to support the side of my head. Lying flat, the pillow cradles my neck and the back of my head firmly but gently. It also helps reduce snoring and facilitates breathing.This is the perfect product! I will order another one for when I travel so I dont have to toss and fidget with those strange hotel/guestroom pillows. Thank you FAIORD!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A really good pillow...almost perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow a little over a month ago, and feel like enough time has passed to give it a fair review. I have chronic back and neck pain and it's been very difficult to find a pillow that will give both comfort and support, the FAIORD pillow has been the closest I've come to getting the quality of sleep before my back was injured. The first night I slept on it was wonderful, no tossing and turning to get comfortable. 30+ days later, it's still a great night's sleep, I believe I need to try the King size for more neck support(I bought the Queen)...not a bad problem to have, lol. It may not be a fit for everyone, it's been a pretty good one for me though, a solid 4.5/5 stars.
